item.title: About
item.description: About Me Welcome to my portfolio. Here’s what you need you to know… Interests I like to think of me as a Jack of all trades. I love getting my hands dirty with code and am always yearning to know more about computers. I am experienced in Python, C++ and some of Flutter. I am a bit inclined towards Machine Learning and to experience AI in modern gizmos is a serious turn on for me.
